QuestData.Title: Rocks Fall, People Die
QuestData.Description: Words fail to describe the massive horror of rock, bone, and blood that rumbles mindlessly and aimlessly ahead of you.$b $bMassive earthquakes crack the seemingly hollow shell of ground beneath the figure, leaving destruction in its wake. It appears that the creature is unaware of your presence.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: In ancient times, one may have worshipped this creature as a lesser god.
